description:
Not every LPA is taking part in this iteration of the service.
    ** This is expected behaviour when JavaScript is disabled in the user's browser. **
name: A prospective appellant selects a Local Planning Department for the case they wish to appeal

steps.name: the user can select from a list of Local Planning Departments
the user does not select a Local Planning Department
the user is informed that a Local Planning Department in the provided list must be selected

elements.name: Selected Local Planning Department not in the list

steps.name: the user can select from a list of Local Planning Departments
the user selects the empty value from the list of Local Planning Departments
the user is informed that a Local Planning Department in the provided list must be selected

elements.name: Selected Local Planning Department is not participating in this service

steps.name: the user can select from a list of Local Planning Departments
the user selects a Local Planning Department that is not participating in this service

result.error_message:
CypressError: `cy.select()` can only be called on a `<select>`. Your subject is a: `<input aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="local-planning-department__listbox" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-describedby="local-planning-department__assistiveHint" autocomplete="off" class="autocomplete__input autocomplete__input--default" id="local-planning-department" name="" placeholder="" type="text" role="combobox">`
    at Context.select (http://localhost:9003/__cypress/runner/cypress_runner.js:135568:19)
    at Context.<anonymous> (http://localhost:9003/__cypress/runner/cypress_runner.js:153308:21)
From Your Spec Code:
    at Context.eval (http://localhost:9003/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\householder-planning\appeals-service\eligibility-local-planning-department-no-js.feature:5463:42)

steps.name: the user is informed that the selected Local Planning Department is not participating in the service

elements.name: Selected Local Planning Department is participating in this service

steps.name: the user can select from a list of Local Planning Departments
the user selects a Local Planning Department that is participating in this service
